.. _developer-reference:

Developer Reference
===================

The intended audience of this guide is mainly to developers who use skewTplus.
It also serves as a more comprehesive description of the packages modules.
For a more general introduction aimed at users see the :ref:`user-reference`.

This guide provides documentation for all modules, function, methods, and classes within SkewTplus
both those in the public API and private members.

Documentation is broken down by module (in order of relevance)

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2
    
    SkewTplus.sounding
    SkewTplus.skewT
    SkewTplus.thermodynamics
    SkewTplus._thermodynamics
    SkewTplus.errorHandling
